#summary The XForms hint element
#labels Feature,Phase-Requirements

= Introduction =

Implementation details of the XForms [http://www.w3.org/TR/xforms11/#ui-commonelems-hint hint] element.

== Using {{{@for}}} ==

The {{{hint}}} element can use the {{{for}}} attribute to indicate which part of the document it should apply to:
{{{
<input id="sn" name="surname" />

<xf:hint for="sn">Please enter your name</xf:hint>
}}}

== Stories ==  

 * user hovers over a control, a [FeatureTooltip tooltip] is displayed.
